title: US DFC Targets AI, Minerals in Expansion
description: A US development-finance agency that’s on track for a tripling in funding aims to invest in data centers for artificial intelligence, as well as critical minerals and energy, according to a top official.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- A US development-finance agency that’s on track for a tripling in funding aims to invest in data centers for artificial intelligence, as well as critical minerals and energy, according to a top official.

title: Applied Digital Sets Fiscal Second Quarter 2026 Conference Call for Wednesday, January 7, 2026, at 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time
description: DALLAS, Dec. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Digital Corporation (Nasdaq: APLD)('Applied Digital' or the 'Company'), a designer, builder, and operator of high-performance, sustainably engineered data centers and colocations services for artificial intelligence, cloud, networking and blockchain workloads, will host a conference call on Wednesday, January 7, 2026, at 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss its operations and financial results for the fiscal second quarter ended November 30, 2025. A press release detailing these results will be issued after the market closes on the same day.

title: Feds defend $1.1-million Deloitte contract for AI advice after firm admitted mistakes
description: The federal government is defending its decision to award a contract worth up to $1.1 million for advice on deploying artificial intelligence to a Canadian branch of Deloitte, a global consulting firm that is under fire for AI-related blunders.
content:

title: Anthropic asks judge to slash legal fees in $1.5 billion settlement
description: Anthropic is urging a federal judge to slash a proposed $300 million legal fee award for lawyers representing authors in a $1.5 billion copyright class action settlement with the artificial intelligence company, arguing there is “scant justification” for a large chunk of the fees.

title: Trump Media to merge with CA nuclear fusion company that wants to power AI in $6B deal
description: In a $6 billion deal, Trump Media is merging with fusion power company TAE Technologies, aiming to power the next wave of artificial intelligence.
content: SAN FRANCISCO -- The parent company of President Donald Trump's Truth Social media platform is merging with a fusion power company, an unusual pairing of the Trump name with a futuristic clean energy venture that aims to power the next wave of artifi... [4340 chars]

title: OpenAI Has Declared ‘Code Red’ Multiple Times, Executive Says
description: Sam Altman’s decision to declare a “code red” at OpenAI earlier this month may have caught the industry’s attention, but it wasn’t a first for the artificial intelligence company.
content:

title: Feds Pave the Way for Big Tech to Plug Data Centers Right Into Power Plants in Scramble for Energy
description: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Federal regulators will allow tech companies to effectively plug massive data centers directly into power plants, issuing a long-awaited order Thursday, as the Trump administration urges it to help the U.S. lead the world in artificial intelligence and revive domestic manufacturing.

title: Trump media to merge with fusion energy company in $6 billion AI power deal
description: Trump Media is merging with fusion energy company TAE Technologies in a multi-billion-dollar deal. The move links social media, clean energy, and artificial intelligence. The new company aims to build large-scale fusion power in the future. Supporters see energy potential, while critics raise concerns about politics, regulation, and funding for this emerging technology.
content:
